amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language in the bill which prohibits funds from being used to authorize construction of the Gulfstream Natural Gas Project.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the provisions in the bill prohibiting funds for authorization of construction of the Gulfstream Natural Gas Project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (FL) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 213 (Roll no. 205).
